ComicInfo.Title: The Minute of Truth, Chapter Three: Childs Play; The Curse of the Crimson Corsair: The Evil That Men Do, Part Three
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Minutemen go on their first big mission as a team, but dark secrets already eat at their foundation. How will one member's past devastate the team's present?
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/before-watchmen-minutemen-3-the-minute-of-truth-ch/4000-354040/
ComicInfo.Editor: Camilla Zhang, Mark Chiarello, Wil Moss
ComicInfo.Characters: Captain Metropolis, Crimson Corsair, Dollar Bill, Hooded Justice, Mothman, Nite Owl (Mason), Phantom, Sally Jupiter, Silhouette, The Comedian
